title: Tele Denmark
content:
Hi   
   
Im not sure if it's a custom font - but if not could anyone help me out..   
   
 [http://www.teledanmark.dk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120418085743/http:/www.teledanmark.dk/)   
   
The specific font is in the top graphics   
   
thanks
author: anonymous

comments.content: Similar to Barmeno -- although the crossbar on the lc 'e' is angled in Barmeno.
Custom type and telecoms go strangely hand in hand.
reminds me of work by Henrik Birkvig from www.dgh.dk or older work by Kubel.

The font reminds me of FF Strada, which is a new typeface by Albert Pingerra. Although the comma is different....   
   
   
Jacques

I think the logo type and headlines are custom, the text font is properly not. It looks very Danish in flavor to me. Find out who designed the site, this would be helpful in determining the origin of the font used.
